data.name: errorTextoBaseDeDatosMensaje
data.value: An error occurred while saving data:

data.name: errorTextoCorreoRecuperacion
data.value: You must enter your email address to recover it

data.name: errorTextoCuentaRelacionada
data.value: There is no account with those credentials

data.name: globalTextoEspecificaContrasena
data.value: Your password must be 8–15 characters and include at least one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character

data.name: inicioSesionTextoEntrarInvitado
data.value: ENTER AS A GUEST (PROGRESS WILL NOT BE SAVED!)

data.name: eliminarAmigoTextoConfirmacion
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove

data.name: invitacionTextoInvitado
data.value: has invited you to join his game!

data.name: comoJugarTextoInstrucciones
data.value: 1. Draw without using words. 2. Guess by typing the exact song title based on the drawing. 3. Points are awarded based on the seconds remaining in the round. 4. The round ends when everyone guesses correctly or time runs out. 5. All players will draw 1 to 3 rounds, depending on the configuration. 6. The player with the most points at the end of the game wins.

data.name: cerrarSesionTextoConfirmacion
data.value: Are you sure you want to log out?

data.name: cambiarContrasenaTextoCodigoVerificacion
data.value: Enter the verification code sent to your email:

data.name: expulsarTextoConfirmacion
data.value: Are you sure you want to kick _?

data.name: expulsarTextoRazonExpulsion
data.value: Add the reason for the expulsion...

data.name: salirPartidaTextoConfirmación
data.value: Are you sure you want to leave the game?

data.name: avisoTextoCodigoDescripcionCambio
data.value: Enter the code we sent to confirm the password change.

data.name: avisoTextoCodigoDescripcionCorreo
data.value: Enter the verification code sent to {0}.

data.name: avisoTextoCodigoDescripcionGenerica
data.value: Enter the verification code we sent to your e-mail.

data.name: avisoTextoCodigoDescripcionRecuperacion
data.value: Enter the code we sent to reset your password.

data.name: avisoTextoCodigoReenviado
data.value: A new code was sent to your e-mail.

data.name: avisoTextoReenvioCodigoNoDisponible
data.value: It is not possible to resend the code yet.

data.name: avisoTextoServidorTiempoSesion
data.value: The server took too long to respond. The current session data will be shown.

data.name: avisoTextoComunicacionServidorSesion
data.value: A communication issue occurred with the server. The current session data will be displayed.

data.name: errorTextoActualizarContrasena
data.value: The password could not be updated. Please try again.

data.name: errorTextoActualizarPerfil
data.value: The profile could not be updated. Please try again.

data.name: errorTextoCodigoIncorrectoExpirado
data.value: The code you entered is incorrect or has expired.

data.name: errorTextoCodigoVerificacionRequerido
data.value: Enter the verification code that was sent to your e-mail.

data.name: errorTextoContrasenaFormato
data.value: The password must be 8 to 15 characters long and include at least one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character.

data.name: errorTextoConfirmacionContrasenaRequerida
data.value: Enter and confirm the new password.

data.name: errorTextoCuentaNoEncontradaSesion
data.value: The account associated with the current session was not found.

data.name: errorTextoCuentaNoRegistrada
data.value: No account was found with the provided username or e-mail.

data.name: errorTextoDeterminarUsuarioCambioContrasena
data.value: The current user could not be determined to change the password.

data.name: errorTextoEnvioCodigoVerificacionDatos
data.value: The verification code could not be sent. Check the information and try again.

data.name: errorTextoEnvioCodigoVerificacionMasTarde
data.value: The verification code could not be sent. Please try again later.

data.name: errorTextoProcesarSolicitudVerificacion
data.value: We couldn't process the verification request. Please try again.

data.name: avisoTextoCodigoEnviado
data.value: We sent a verification code to your e-mail.

data.name: errorTextoSolicitudVerificacionActiva
data.value: We couldn't find an active verification request.

data.name: errorTextoSolicitudVerificacionVigente
data.value: There is no active verification request.

data.name: errorTextoCuentaDatosNoDisponibles
data.value: The account data is not available.

data.name: errorTextoRegistrarCuentaMasTarde
data.value: We couldn't register the account. Please try again later.

data.name: errorTextoCredencialesIncorrectas
data.value: The credentials you entered are incorrect.

data.name: errorTextoSolicitudRecuperacionInvalida
data.value: The recovery request is not valid.

data.name: errorTextoSolicitudRecuperacionActiva
data.value: We couldn't find an active recovery request.

data.name: errorTextoCodigoExpiradoSolicitarNuevo
data.value: The verification code has expired. Please request a new one.

data.name: avisoTextoCodigoVerificadoCambio
data.value: Code verified successfully. You can continue with the password change.

data.name: errorTextoSolicitudRecuperacionVigente
data.value: There is no active recovery request.

data.name: errorTextoNombreObligatorioLongitud
data.value: Name is required and must not exceed 50 characters.

data.name: errorTextoApellidoObligatorioLongitud
data.value: Last name is required and must not exceed 50 characters.

data.name: errorTextoUsuarioNoEncontrado
data.value: The specified user was not found.

data.name: errorTextoJugadorNoExiste
data.value: No player is associated with the specified user.

data.name: errorTextoAvatarNoExiste
data.value: The selected avatar does not exist.

data.name: errorTextoErrorProcesarSolicitud
data.value: There was a problem processing the request.

data.name: errorTextoIdentificarAvatar
data.value: The selected avatar could not be identified. Please try again.

data.name: errorTextoIdentificadorRecuperacionRequerido
data.value: Enter the registered username or e-mail to recover the password.

data.name: errorTextoIdentificadorRedSocialLongitud
data.value: The {0} handle must not exceed {1} characters.

data.name: errorTextoIniciarCambioContrasena
data.value: The password change process could not be started. Please try again.

data.name: errorTextoIniciarRecuperacion
data.value: The password recovery process could not be started. Please try again.

data.name: errorTextoPerfilActualizarInformacion
data.value: The updated profile information could not be obtained.

data.name: errorTextoPrepararSolicitudCambioContrasena
data.value: An error occurred while preparing the password change request.

data.name: errorTextoSeleccionAvatarValido
data.value: Select a valid avatar before saving the changes.

data.name: errorTextoServidorActualizarContrasena
data.value: There was an error while updating the password.

data.name: errorTextoServidorActualizarPerfil
data.value: There was an error while updating the profile.

data.name: errorTextoServidorCodigoVerificacion
data.value: There was an error while requesting the verification code.

data.name: errorTextoServidorInformacionAvatar
data.value: Information for the selected avatar could not be obtained.

data.name: errorTextoServidorInicioRecuperacion
data.value: There was an error while starting the password recovery.

data.name: errorTextoServidorInicioSesion
data.value: There was an error while signing in.

data.name: errorTextoServidorNoDisponible
data.value: There was a communication problem with the server. Please try again later.

data.name: errorTextoServidorObtenerPerfil
data.value: There was an error while retrieving the profile information.

data.name: errorTextoServidorReenviarCodigo
data.value: There was an error while resending the code.

data.name: errorTextoServidorSolicitudCambioContrasena
data.value: There was an error while requesting the password change.

data.name: errorTextoServidorTiempoAgotado
data.value: The server took too long to respond. Please try again later.

data.name: errorTextoServidorValidarCodigo
data.value: There was an error while validating the code.

data.name: errorTextoSolicitarNuevoCodigo
data.value: A new code could not be requested. Please try again.

data.name: errorTextoTiempoEsperaCodigo
data.value: You must wait {0} seconds before requesting a new code.

data.name: errorTextoVerificarCodigo
data.value: The code could not be verified. Please try again.

data.name: errorTextoValidacionCodigoNoDisponible
data.value: Code validation is not available at this time.

data.name: errorTextoSolicitudVerificacionInvalida
data.value: The verification request is not valid. Please try again.

data.name: errorTextoCamposInvalidosGenerico
data.value: There are invalid or empty fields, please verify your information.
